column2: Fianna are warrior bands that survive in the wild, raiding and protecting their homeland from invaders. Individual féinnid band together in groups of 9 or 27, forming a fiann. In addition to hunting, they also uphold filidecht, a sacred poetic tradition.

The bold warriors of the Company of the Boar hold eachother to a high standard of honor and provide mentorship if a member seems to stray. They are known to regard wild boars highly and their families will use totems of these fierce creatures to bestow strength and ferocity to their members.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own character portrait to temporarily improve your martial prowess.
column3: Permet d'améliorer temporairement vos prouesses martiales.\n(Faites un clic droit sur votre portrait)
column4: Ermöglicht Euch, auf Euer eigenes Charakterporträt einen §GRechtsklick§! zu machen, um Ihre Kampfkunst vorübergehend zu verbessern.
column6: Puedes §Ghacer clic derecho§! en el retrato de tu personaje para mejorar temporalmente tu destreza marcial.

column2: Has NOT already sounded a battle cry
column3: N'a pas déjà sonné un cri de bataille
column4: Hat NICHT schon einen Schlachtruf ausgelöst
column6: NO ha sonado ya un grito de batalla

column3: Vitesse de déplacement: §G+10.0%§!\nDégâts contre ses ennemis religieux: §G+10.0%§!
column6: Velocidad de movimiento: §G+10.0%§!\nDaño producido a un enemigo religioso: §G+10.0%§!

column2: adjusting the fit of [fellow_member.GetHerHis] pack, pointing out that our hike has gone on longer than planned. The [fellow_member.GetManWoman] smirks before remarking: "you're a natural in these hills, my friend."
